title: La Vuelta a España 2021 Standings after Stage 7
content:
General Classification / Red Jersey 

With pretty much every kilometre either uphill or downhill in stage 7, it was a tough day in the mountains for the GC contenders. The race started hard and red jersey wearer Roglič looked to be under pressure in certain parts, but he just held on to the race lead ahead of BORA Hansgrohe's Großschartner who catapulted up the standings after being in the breakaway of the day.
